text: The ESSEC is an important school teaching business to adults in France. It was created in 1907 in Paris, but it has moved to Cergy-Pontoise, a city west of Paris, in 1973. In 2006, ESSEC set up a campus in Singapore, Asia. Twice a year, about 50 ESSEC students go and study there. ESSEC is now one of the most famous Business Schools and Grandes Ã‰coles in France. ESSEC is frequently ranked second nationally. == Other websites == *ESSEC Business School Paris Singapore website in English Category:1900s establishments in France Category:1907 establishments in Europe Category:Schools in France Category:Business organizations Category:Organizations based in Paris
title: ESSEC Business School
